forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 13 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, a gentle ballet of clouds dances across the night sky, juxtaposed against the shimmering city lights. The air is cool, a refreshing embrace lingering about 54 degrees, as a southwest wind whispers through the streets, hinting at the promise of tomorrow. As the sun rises, it will unveil a mostly sunny canvas, with temperatures expected to warm to a comfortable 65, before settling back into the coolness of the afternoon around 63. 

For those venturing out, a light jacket will suffice amid the brisk breeze, particularly as gusts may reach up to 29 mph later in the day. The horizon may reveal muted colors at dawn, with a fleeting touch of fog hinting at the greater expanse of the bay, though clarity will soon break through as daytime graces the city. A morning stroll through a quiet park or a leisurely coffee on a sunlit patio could provide the perfect start to your day, allowing you to engage with the unique charm of San Francisco as it gradually awakens.
